bill.summary: This bill amends the District of Columbia Stadium Act of 1957 to require the Department of the Interior to extend the 50-year lease for the use of the ground under and parking facilities associated with Robert F. Kennedy Memorial Stadium by the District of Columbia government so that the lease shall be in effect for a total period of 100 years.
